name: Truck Challenge 3D FREE
description:
Challenging truck driving with difficult load in tough environment. Unfortunately the cargo isn't fastened very well but your job is to deliver everything from start to finish anyway.

Test your real driving skills.There is a time limit to keep you on your toes.

Your precision driving skills will be tested and pushed to the limit!
features:
- Smooth gameplay
- Beautiful 3D graphics
- Unique Truck driving experience, including a Truck trailer!
- A pro version of the game with more levels is coming soon!

More levels coming soon! If you have any technical issues, please write to me.
e-mail : ahmetkocak998@gmail.com
